name: Miskro
description:
MISKRO
Three islands, an ancient power, and lots of little secrets. Discover these magical abilities and fulfill the wish of a strange deity.

For Windows machines only. Gamepad supported.

WASD / Left Control Stick - Move

Mouse / Right Control Stick - Look

Space / A - Jump

Q / Left Bumper - Shrink

E / Right Bumper - Grow

Esc - Quit
